main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing lights in a crescent formation in the sky over San Antonio, Texas on March 30, 1952.
interesting points: The witnesses observed between 6 to 10 bright white lights arranged in a crescent shape,The lights were described as having a very high intensity and appeared to be fluorescent,The estimated speed of the lights was around 1500 mph,There was no sound associated with the lights during the sighting,The investigators concluded the objects could possibly be balloons, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena.
witness description: Private residence witnesses including Major from 17th Air Force Base, a branch manager, and his wife.
